subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets ended a three-game slide and improved to 4-6 with a pummeling of the Rams behind a brilliant performance by Mark Sanchez and a defense that forced three turnovers.
snippet: The Jets ended a three-game slide and improved to 4-6 with a pummeling of the Rams behind a brilliant performance by Mark Sanchez and a defense that forced three turnovers.
